website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quirks, this vitamin C serum is worth considering if you prefer a product that doesn't contain a lot of extra ingredients that could irritate the skin.
pros: Made in the U.S.A. with ingredients that are derived from organic sources
Some repeat customers rave about more even skin tone and texture with regular use
cons: Some reports of breakouts, especially among users with oily skin
Has a mild but strange scent

customer_reviews.title: Reduced stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I use this after derma rolling and absolutely love it. It makes my skin feel soft and dewy. Great company. This is after about 4 treatments with the derma roller and serum combined
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome... love it.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using twice a day with my moisturizer and it really evened out my skin.. it has water like consistency and just disappears in to the skin instantly.. loving it so far... highly recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Hitendra Joshi

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED MY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with acne for 20 years and nothing has really ever helped. Then I got this serum.... I thought it was a marketing ploy to say it brightens skin but it really does! I even stopped using it recently (just got out of my routine) and my acne came back quite a bit. After 2 nights of using it again it has made the world of a difference and I will never NOT use it. Highly recommended!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hoeffel

customer_reviews.title: I'm crazy about this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This serum has quickly become part of my nightly ritual! I have noticed lines disappearing and altogether my face looks very clear and refreshed. I have been going around without makeup and I get asked all the time my beauty regime. I use the serum twice a day, once in the morning before my makeup and once at night after washing my face and then I apply my moisturizer. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JohnLennonismyspiritanimal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vitamin c serum!! It absorbs well in skin , gives a beautiful glow. I use it before I put my moisturizer on but at night before bed I use it alone after I cleanse my face. I will continue to order this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tysha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Smooth glowing skin!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product. It is a perfect dupe to Drunk Elephants vitamin C serum and for a great price. My skin is smoother and has a more even tone over all. I use it in the morning and at night. On my second bottle now.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G Walker

customer_reviews.title: Will never stop using this vitamin C serum!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff. I have always used Vitamin C serum off and on during the years, but now that I'm in my early sixties, I have been using it on a daily basis, and my skin is actually getting younger and younger looking! Family and even strangers ask me how I have such great-looking skin. Good genes and sunscreen help, but in the last 4 months this stuff has made my face age backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something changed
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time buying this brand of vitamin C serum. The first 2 were wonderful. So this time, I bought a bigger bottle. It is just a white liquid, nothing like the first 2 bottles. My guess is they forgot to put the active ingredients in. I don’t know but I’m disappointed with this purchase and will look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: K. J. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin C serum is in my daily skin care routine ...
customer_reviews.text: Vitamin C serum is in my daily skin care routine. I also have introduced it to my daughters and they have been using it on a regular basis. My skin responds with a pinkish glow , smoothness and fresh appearance, on which I get compliments all the time. I travel a lot and this little bottle is in my travelling bag - a must for a woman of any age!
customer_reviews.author: MissPicky

customer_reviews.title: Terrific! In one week my skin showed improvement. After four weeks my skin looked tighter, brighter and looks glowing.
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about tree of life vitamin c serum are the results! In addition it absorbs very fast and doesn’t have the sticky feeling of heavier vitamin c serums . They remain sticky so no make up can be used with heavy, sticky c serums. I find the thinner vitamin c serums absorb faster which makes it nice under makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Rickborn

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't a believer
customer_reviews.text: I gave the product a try for a month and at first I was skeptical. But man, am I a believer of this product now. I had really bad dry skin around certain portions of my face and using this daily helped to keep the skin healthy and moist. I also never bothered with sunscreen because I have an allergy to the chemicals used in them and I find the texture really gross feeling even when using physical blockers but after using this product, I noticed my skin noticeably lighten after extended regular use. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: FJB

customer_reviews.title: A simple, easy way to a fresh face
customer_reviews.text: I believe the best things in life are simple - and that includes taking good care of oneself. Keeping happy thoughts helps one to feel and look better, but it also helps to find good sensible products to help the outside of you looking fresh. ToLB Vitamin C Serum for Face with Hyaluronic Acid works - I apply it after my shower and that's it! After two months I have very few lines still showing and I will continue using this great product to look even fresher. BTW - I did not have a problem with the smell of the product, because I almost always buy the unscented version of beauty products anyway - why complicate things?
customer_reviews.author: Luvs Neustuff

customer_reviews.title: Best on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best on Amazon. I used to be. SkinCeuticals CE Feurlic user, but it became cost prohibitive. I have tried 7 different Vitamin C Serums on Amazon and this is the BEST i have found. Not gritty Not thick No odd smell It's the most potent Vitamin C I have found! This is my second purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this serum for a few weeks now. My skin is noticeable smoother and brighter. It also seems to help minimize my pores and reduce my rosacea flare ups. I will definitely continue to use this serum.
customer_reviews.author: DMD

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I have only wonderful feedback to share on the Tree of Life products! I use both the Retinol and Vitamin C serums daily, the Vitamin C serum in the morning and the Retinol serum at night. As well, I use the Retinol night cream in the evening. I can actually see and feel the difference in my skin. I have bought both of the serums for my two sisters, and they are using the products now. Thank you Tree of Life Beauty for your skin changing products, and also for your concern that your customers are satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not a serum
customer_reviews.text: This item is NOT a serum. It’s very runny; it looks like dirty water. To make things worse, it has a very strong mildew/mold smell. I tested a patch on the back of my hand and it immediately turned red & puffy. To be clear, I’m allergic to mold.
customer_reviews.author: Allf4

customer_reviews.title: It's a shame because the amount of Vitamin C in this really seemed to do a good job smoothing out and brightening my skin
customer_reviews.text: At first this worked amazingly well, I noticed results from the first application. However, after only a couple weeks of using this, my pores became really enlarged and my skin texture became bumpy - I don't know what it is but there's something in this that seems to clog my skin. It's a shame because the amount of Vitamin C in this really seemed to do a good job smoothing out and brightening my skin. Sigh. Back to the drawing board...
customer_reviews.author: Jimi Han

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Vitamin C Serum I have used, can't beat the price. I absorbs quickly into the skin, helps with sunspots and skin unevenness within the first week. I was amazed. Love that it is organic.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Watery and smells like hotdog water
customer_reviews.text: It’s so watery that it slips through your fingers before you can get it to your face. It would be tolerable if it didn’t reek of hotdog water. That’s literally what it smells like. Don’t know if I got a bad batch. I must have or all the reviews would say the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Product Recipe Changed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pretty frequently and it was a great product, but they recently changed the entire recipe formulation to remove many of the quality ingredients and add more filler. Removed MSM, hyaluronic acid, amino acids and added way more glycerin as a filler. Glycerin used to be the 9th ingredient in the list and is now the 2nd ingredient - the consistency is no longer an orangish liquid but more a pale white gel. It might still work for others, but I'm going to find a better quality Vitamin C serum that still contains MSM, hyaluronic acid, and the other beneficial ingredients for skin without extra fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in November and I’ve been closely monitoring my skin...with all the good review I’ve read about Vitamin C serum ...this actually made my skin worse ... I want from “ okay skin “ trying to improve it ...to “ bad “ skin after using it . Now I’m struggling to get rid of how ugly my skin looks now .
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: New formula is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product at first and was a great value. Company has since changed the formula to more of a lotion than serum. Its impossible to dispense with dropper. No longer has hyaluronic acid and appears to have less vitamin C as well. Won't be buying again and will throw out new bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Only products you will need!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had a fabulous experience with Tree of Life Beauty products and customer service! If I could add more stars to rate them, I would. Somehow 5 stars just isn't enough. I am a 54 year old female. And while my skin is healthy - my morning and evening routine with these products has gotten me closer to my ultimate goal: Have great looking skin without makeup! Tree of Life Beauty products makes that end goal attainable. I've been using their products for only a month by the way...I can't wait to see what happens in 3 months! Additionally, the price is a great deal! Throw away your other products - you simply won't need them.
customer_reviews.author: blissfull

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE New Formula leaves face sticky and causes breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Was clear now a thick cloudy goo. New formula = Glycerin and Aloe are now the second and third ingredients and then Vitimin C and Witch Hazel. The new formula leaves my face feeling slimy even once dried. If you are not used to the old stuff you will not miss the amazing, light, thight and clean feel that this product once had. This was my favorite vit.c. serum, better than the expensive stuff, but now it leaves my face sticky and causes breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Plantwallah

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin C serum
customer_reviews.text: I was ordering and loving the vitamin C serum and you changed the formula. I loved that it dried quickly, was not sticky and I could apply makeup right away. I am not happy with the changes you made .
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Smells like hotdog water as someone else stated
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Watery and smells like hotdog water and those cheap brown paper towels they had in school, except if they were wet. Actually dried out my face.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Reformulated & Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I had been using this for a few months and I LOVED it. I went through a bottle a month & signed up for Subscribe & Save even. Well the last 2 bottles I received were a totally different product. It was gloopy and clogged my pores. The previous formula was watery and perfect, I cannot use the new formula.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Two bottles, same product, completely different
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a second bottle after finishing my first. I really liked the results from the first. The second bottle came and it is completely different. While the first bottle was an almost clear liquid with a slightly orange tint, this is milky and white. It also does not smell the same. I am not sure which bottle is the correct formulation, but this shows that the product is not consistently made in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a difference after 2 weeks...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use in conjunction with a micro derm needle roller for the face and neck... The absorption and effect of the vitamin C serum is enhanced and has been noticeable. Suggest that you really need to shake the bottle well before using... as the product contains some emulsified solids which have separated and appear in the dropper. (-1⭐️)
customer_reviews.author: Stewardship

customer_reviews.title: New formula?
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this product it was amazing but the second bottle gave me a break out and had a completely different smell, consistency, and effect... Old formula 10/10 new 0/10
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Norris

customer_reviews.title: Not the original product from reviews
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same product people from a year ago to 6 months ago are posting about. I recieved a bottle of this about 4 months ago and really loved it. I decided to buy it again from the same seller and I noticed the consistancy was alot thicker than it was originally. I saw that the contents listed vitamin c as the 4th ingredient, rather than the 2nd in the bottle I had used before. This may not seem like a big difference for some but if I wanted mostly aloe or glycerin, I would buy that. This product can be misleading because it is called vitamin C serum and not just moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonee

customer_reviews.title: Changed the consistency too milky now
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this product, but they changed the consistency of it as of (6/2019) to a milky or creamy texture and i notice it no longer packs the punch it used to give my skin. I am not buying this anymore. I want the more watery formula
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too watery for my liking.
customer_reviews.text: The product is the consistency of water. In the answered questions, the company explains exactly why it has such a consistency. But, the watery serum just isn't for me. It immediately drips off my face, almost before I can rub it in. I used TruSkin Naturals Vitamin C Serum before trying this brand. TruSkin is a thick serum, which I heavily preferred. Between the two brands, I saw obvious results with TruSkin from day one...not so much with ToLB.
customer_reviews.author: RachelOK

customer_reviews.title: Former regular now switching off
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a niche but solid product, but when I reordered and received this product, I realized the the formulation changed without warning when the serum was goopier than usual (the new aloe probably). I might not have minded if if weren't for the fact that ferulic acid was removed which, for the uninformed, substantially decreases the photo-protection of this product. I'll be looking elsewhere for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: T.N

customer_reviews.title: How to contact company for questions?
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product three times, and the most recent one I received was different. First two contained a liquid of a water-like consistency, but the third was cloudy and gloppy. I liked the first two, but am concerned the last one might be spoiled - the scent is different as well. Could not figure out how to contact the company to ask if it is a formula change or a problem with the third bottle. Not going to buy again until I know why the change.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: There is alcohol listed on the bottle, but not ...
customer_reviews.text: There is alcohol listed on the bottle, but not listed on the sell page. I went back and looked. I wouldn't of got it if I had known that prior to buying. They should of listed that in their ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnybrook

customer_reviews.title: definitely not quality Vitamin C like advertised. I tried it because who doesnt like ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Nothing special, definitely not quality Vitamin C like advertised. I tried it because who doesnt like inexpensive luxuries? Dont waste your money, though, its crap. Wish I would've read the 1 star reviews before I wasted my time with this product. I'll be returning since I drive by the ups store daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: the only product you need!
customer_reviews.text: guys!!! i have been using THIS vitamin C serum religiously for almost 2 months now. Prior to this i was using toners and face lotion and make up etc. i wanted to stop putting make up on my face. i wanted to stop putting lotion on my face. BUT my skin had some uneven tones and i didnt feel confident in going bare just yet! i read up on vitamin c serum and took the plunge. I AM NEVER LOOKING BACK! i wash my face, put 1 dropper full of vitamin c on my face morning and night. AND.THAT.IS.IT my friends!!!!!!! my skin tone is even, glowing, healthy! i absolutely love it. go get yourself some!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. This product is more of a lubricant than vitamin c serum. The rope two ingredient are water and glycerin which is used in hair gel and is basically a lubricant that leaves a shiny top layer on the skin not actually soaking into your pores. It peels off after minutes of drying and looks flaky and disgusting. This is not what a true vitamin C serum should look or smell like. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dell

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent formula between 3 bottles 😞
customer_reviews.text: I was a major fan of this product for making my skin glow and erasing my dark spots and helping with acne, and I've been using it for around 5-6 months. At first it worked wonders for my skin, however, by my 3rd order, the product was no longer a thin liquid, it was more of a sticky gel, which took forever to absorb into my skin and seemed less effective. I am saddened that they changed the formula so suddenly without mentioning that in the description, so I hope this review will help other people before they purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out within a few days of use
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to enjoy this product - it has a very light texture and doesn't feel sticky. However, the number of extra ingredients beyond Vitamin C ended up being a problem for me. This broke me out pretty badly (lots of closed comedones) within a few days of use. Back to the regular stuff for me.
customer_reviews.author: R&N

customer_reviews.title: Acne be gone!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I’ve been on and off for a month and I’ve narrowed down my skin loves this! I’ve only used it once a day at night but will increase my usage because I can tell it makes my skin softer, pores are reduced, smoothes complexion, and it literally is the only thing in my current regimen that stops my new pimples from forming all the way.
customer_reviews.author: LLCoolD

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I am using this to rid crow's feet and am super impressed with the results. Natural and chemical free is important to me and this tightens and really lasts longer than just the day I put it on, I am seeing real changes. I am 38 and just started to notice "lines". I was not too far into the wrinkles, but needed to reverse the process. Super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Changed Formula or Bad Batch?
customer_reviews.text: I’m SO confused. I bought my first bottle of this 2 months ago and it worked great. It felt light and comfortable on my skin and had a watery consistency. I just re-upped, but this time the consistency is thick and slimy. It is itchy in my skin when dried and comes up in rolls if I rub my skin after applying it. I’ve also begun breaking out slightly, although I’m not sure enough to attribute it to this new bottle of serum. I bought two bottles when I re-upped, so I’ll check the second, unopened bottle to see if it is liquidy like my first order. If not, I will discontinuing using this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this 3 times. The first bottle was amazing and I was starting to notice some positive changes in my skin. When I reordered I received a broken bottle. Next time I reordered the serum was white and thick even though it was sealed. It was so thick that when I turned the bottle upside down it took a good 10 seconds for the product to reach the opening. Not sure if I will reorder again which is a shame because my first bottle was great!
customer_reviews.author: My Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Will definitely buy again. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and soft. It calms the redness down, and gives me a glow. I tried a few other brands sold on Amazon. Some are better than others but this one is my favorite yet!
customer_reviews.author: NurseLenni

customer_reviews.title: Unusual color and consistency
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this several times and have loved it. But I just opened a brand new bottle and instead of it’s usually citrusy scent and watery consistency it’s a milky color and thick consistency. I just slathered it all over my face but now I’m concerned something is weird about it. Anyone else have this with this product before?
customer_reviews.author: Tanya S.

customer_reviews.title: The best part is that on my cranky
customer_reviews.text: Currently using this with a microneedle roller. The best part is that on my cranky, semi-sensitive skin, I have had absolutely zero negative reaction, and I'm noticing that my skin is looking a bit brighter. I will have to wait a few more weeks to see if it has a real impact, but I'm definitely hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: NEW FORMULA IS ABSOLUTE CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this product, but the new formulation is crap! It is so thick that it cannot be used with the dropper. It leaves my skin feeling very sticky. On top of that, my face was completely covered in pustules after three days of use. I threw it in the garbage, where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Serum came slightly yellow in color
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamin c serum for the price, the only issue is that mine came partially oxidized. Vitamin C has a very short shelflife and once it starts to turn yellow that means the vitamin C is no longer active. My serum came slightly yellowed, which means the vitamin C is in the process of becoming an inactive ingredient...
customer_reviews.author: Kayley

customer_reviews.title: Just wow.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for two days, I bought the vitamin C serum and the Retinol serum. I put on the retinol serum one night and the vitamin C the next day and night and my face feels like a million bucks. I don't which or if its the combination that is making it feel like a babys bottom. Two days is all it took for me to fall in love, you have a customer for life! I have tried a lot of things, skin wise, and I have never been so impressed with products. By the way, the vitamin C smells god awful, like rotten fruit. Again worth it.
customer_reviews.author: julia6998

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the new formula
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item previously and loved it. Since then, the formula has changed for the worse. The consistency is thick and cloudy. The effectiveness of this product has changed as well. I do not see a difference after using the new formula for two months. I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: abookreader

customer_reviews.title: REFORMULATED
customer_reviews.text: Beware!!! This product used to be my holy grail serum, watery, sunk into skin well, no smell, and then they reformulated into this thick sticky crap, that smelled like hot dogs and clogged my pores. I am lowkey devastated.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Mackert

customer_reviews.title: Love Tree of Life serums
customer_reviews.text: Love Tree of Life vitamin C serum. It has drastically reduced the appearance of the age spots I had on my face. I said had because they are almost completely gone and I believe with another month of use they will have disappeared. I am not joking when I say with the tree of Life combo meaning the bit C, retinol and Hyaluronic acid serums I now look 15 years younger and who doesn’t want to look younger I know I do lol. Thanks tree of Life for taking the years off my face.
customer_reviews.author: avie moore

customer_reviews.title: Makes your face sticky!!
customer_reviews.text: 1st time I bought TruSkin Vitamin C, used whole bottle and decided to try something new. But I do regret that decision. The consistency is thick and makes your face SOO sticky where as the TruSkin just soaked into my skin leaving me feeling refreshed. Will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Made Me Break Out..
customer_reviews.text: Not saying it's not a good product, just didn't work out for me unfortunately. I'm 46,oily/acne prone during cycle.. I started breaking out as soon as I used it. I knew it was this product because I wasn't on my period, hadn't added/subtracted any other item in my daily facial routine. Again, probably just me. But if you're acne - prone, just consider before you buy. I've decided to go with buying Vitamin C Powder, that way I can mix with my existing facial products that I know won't break me out. And the price is about the same.
customer_reviews.author: Saj

customer_reviews.title: The serum looks so much thicker than the ad pictures
customer_reviews.text: It is strange that the serum is so much thicker than the picture and my second order was even thicker. It is thick like a moisturizer and not serum. I’m not sure it was expired or knock off products.
customer_reviews.author: Monikin T.

customer_reviews.title: Not a Serum
customer_reviews.text: This product is not really a serum. It came stuck inside the bottle like jell-o. It does not go on smoothly, is cloudy, very sticky, and made my skin burn and peel. I should have read the reviews a little closer before purchasing. Whatever changes were made to the formula completely ruined this product.
customer_reviews.author: guessnumber11

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product. Just using this is keeping my skin soft and in good comdition.I was getting forehead wrinkles-whether from ageing or dehydration, I dont know,, but this took care of it. I use double the suggested amouunt, but because I use it as my moisturizer. My skin can be sensitive, but this doesn't bother me. Great price. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: anoushka

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recomend this product. Sorry!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not my intention to make the brand look bad, but its my responsibility to say what happened TO ME with it. Just got the product and it seems its like water. Its leaves my skin si sticky and it has like the worst smell ever!! If it’s past due from the expired date, why did they sell it?? I think that skin products have to smell clean. Nice. Like new. This one doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: It's very thin and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I'd compare the consistency of this product to rain water. It's nothing like a serum. It's a lot of trace amounts of chemicals and water. I usually go the all organic route when it comes to moisturizers for my face. Coconut oil, Olive oil, etc. I decided one day to try something different and this turned out to be a waste of money. It's not worth the packaging or dropper bottle that it comes in. I'm really not one to give bad reviews but I honestly think this product made my face dryer. Also it has a moldy, cheap, diluted scent.
customer_reviews.author: Dairlyn Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell.
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy a different brand that’s made in Utah. I decided to save money, but ended up wasting it on a product that smells as if it went rancid. I should have returned it, but at first just figured it was the way it was. Months later, a friend smelled it and told me to dump it as it smelled rancid. That’s when I realized that was the smell. It felt too oily on the skin and didn’t absorb well either. I won’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Tori C.

customer_reviews.title: New formal is super sticky and tacky.  Why???? 😞
customer_reviews.text: I have reordered this product several times. I loved it and then the formula was changed and now it is super sticky and tacky, exactly what I hated about the other brands. Impossible to apply foundation and other products over smoothly. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Herb Trace

customer_reviews.title: Formula was changed
customer_reviews.text: What happened? This went from being a clear liquid to a thick, milky cream.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Lemme tell you somethin. I am a 30 year old African American man and I have been trying to even out my tone for years. Nothing has ever worked until this. It literally took 2 bottles to erase years of scars and hyperpigmentation. They've got a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Great serum
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE : The company changed their formula; vitamin C was 2nd ingredient and witch hazel was 3rd. Now glycerine is 2nd ingredient. I do not recommend this new recipe. I've been using this serum for the past 6 months and I cannot recommend it enough. It is not oily or too thick; blends into your skin nicely. My skin tone has evened out and my acne improved too; still have blackheads but not the whiteheads I was prone to.
customer_reviews.author: Bluejeanbugga

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is a good batch or not
customer_reviews.text: So I’m not sure if this batch I got is good or bad but it’s definitely different from the first time I ordered so not I’m not sure which was the good batch being this one is thick like gel form and the one I had before was a lot thinner like water based I hope this isn’t expired
customer_reviews.author: S .thompson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Vitamin C produces noticeable positive results
customer_reviews.text: This Vitamin C serum is strong enough and apparently pure enough that results really are evident immediately upon using it in the recommended twice-daily routine, and just a few drops really do go a long way. The dropper applicator works well, and the relatively small size of this bottle makes it an easy part of any travel skin care regimen. The skin on my face looks healthier after just a few days of use, and I look forward to seeing the full results after a month of regular daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Sue Larson

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy in color with a strong chemially scent and just overall Ineffective.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a vitamin C serum and I've been reading a bit about them. Most websites say it should be clear in color but this one is cloudy. Despite that I still tired the serum on my skin hoping that it would still be effective. Immediately after application my skin felt irritated and extremely dry. It's a real shame because I wanted this to work so much. I'm wishing I really listened to the other reviews before I bought this. I do believe that the serums they're selling are already oxidized. So basically this serum is ineffective. I'm really disappointed in this, it has just been a waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Madame

customer_reviews.title: Im amazed how well this works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this every morning for about 6 weeks now. I've noticed a more even skin tone, less bumps and smaller pores. My skin looks much brighter and healthier. This with a charcoal daily cleanser has gotten my skin to a point where favorite full coverage MAC foundation isnt even needed. A touch of concealer under my eyes and powder is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Soileau

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite vitamin c serum. I've used trueskin vitamin c but when i went to order amazon pulled it off their site. I used it a few days when it first arrived and my skin was instantly brighten. I'm 30 with acne prone normal to dry skin. Im black with hyperpigmentation/dark spots and a uneven tone. The only difference i've seen so far is the glow of my skin and a softness. Its a thicker consistency , i didn't find it moisturizing although i like the fact it almost went on my face matt so i can then add a moisturizer. ***Will update with more use***
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real or enough vitamin C
customer_reviews.text: This product is the same color and consistent as their hyaluronic acid product which leads me to believe it is NOT really vitamin C. The color alone proves that to me as well. Despite the very thin layer I try and put on my face, it still leaves a film on my face that peels off when I put on my foundation. Not cool. Read other 1 star reviews and you will see what I mean about this product not being what it used to be. I compared this to another true 12% vitamin C product I buy frequently and this product doesn’t come close. I do not believe their has been any improvements to my skin with this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: During my third pregnancy and almost 2 years later my skin has gotten so bad. I breakout so much and couldn’t find anything to help it. I have lots of dark spots that make me so self conscious. I have only had this for 2 weeks and you can totally notice a difference. My husband even noticed right away and was amazed. I am using the body shop tea tree facial wash followed by this then after this dries I use a few drops of rose hip oil all over for moisture and I’m loving it all so far! I haven’t experience any burning with my routine and I have sensitive skin. *mine came very thick and a milky color
customer_reviews.author: Shaelin Arata

customer_reviews.title: Works for a Man
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is "anti aging." It's just hydrating and providing you with vitamin c if you are deficient. It's not magic. It's literally just hydrating your skin. I apply it generously after I shave in the morning. It does make my face look younger (by hydration) and as a result the dark circles under my eyes have faded. Things that will also help you look younger / help with dark circles FAR MORE EFFECTIVELY than this supplement, eating healthy diet, stop drinking alcohol, getting 8 hours of sleep every night, stop eating animal products. This is just a supplement to help you, you gotta get the rest of your life in order first. This supplement does help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This formula is so thick! It comes with the dispenser tube full of the serum, since it's so thick no matter how many times you squeeze it to get the serum out, very little to nothing comes out. This serum is so sticky, honestly it's gross. No matter how little you use, the consistency is sticky! I reached out to the seller, and let me tell you was that pointless! They said it's supposed to be that thick and to use less. When i specifically told them I'm using a very small amount. Vitamin C serum shouldn't be as thick and as sticky as they make it! Don't purchase complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal E

customer_reviews.title: Great for age spots!
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended by my dermatologist that I use Vitamin C to fade age spots on my face and this product has worked very well for me. I use prescription Retin-A at night and Vitamin C in the morning before I apply moisturizer. My skin is very even toned and I find I can use a very light foundation since there isn't much to cover. I have been using this product for about 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t sting going on. There isn’t really a scent. The product As a moisturizer- it falls WAY short. The product sort of leaves a film on the skin as it dries. The product is also pricey for what you get. The bottle is not filled to the top. Also since the bottle is dark brown it is hard to see how much is left. Received the Vit C serum 4 days ago, used it only 4 times - 2 droppers/day - and the bottle seems almost empty already!!
customer_reviews.author: Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I read all the great reviews and went for this. It didn’t work for me. I used it for more than a month and didn’t see any difference. Plus, I used in the morning and the followed it by moisturizer, but in couple of hours, my skin had white patches. It’s like flour on your face, o rubbed it and it came out. It might have worked for others but didn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sonakshi

customer_reviews.title: FORMULA CHANGE :(
customer_reviews.text: This product was great now is just this thick mostly glycerin consistency not good. It doesn’t do nothing for my skin just stickiness. Now I need to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail A

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic serum, fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: . I love this vitamin C serum. It is so affordable, and such good quality! I have tried others, but this is definitely my favorite. I wear it under my sunscreen because I heard from someone that the sun will oxidize the vitamin C and not your sunscreen when worn underneath it. Not sure if that’s true, but I have some melasma and I will try anything that will help it. This product is gentle and has never caused me to break out like others have. While it does feel slightly tacky when I first apply it, it is soon absorbed into my skin and the stickiness goes away completely. For me, this is a must-have.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin? Use it less often
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin I would not use this everyday especially because theres no way of knowing how much vitamin c is in it because the packaging does not say. I wanted to wait a while before posting a review to give myself time to notice if this works with my face routine and it does. I use this every night do see some difference. Remember to use spf every morning of at least 30 when using this ( I would advise using this in a night routine ) because you will cause damage. MY ONLY downside about this product is that it does not label the percentage of vitamin c in it therefore 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Esthefany Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Im sorry To say this but it didnt work for me. I had High hope after reading all the good reviews. Im on m'y third week and i can ses just a litle bit of différent on m'y acne scars. I Will not purchase again since it is working slow for me and also has this sticking feeling on m'y face that i dont l'île. It Luke im putting h oney on m'y face May be it Will work for you
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: It took 3 days..
customer_reviews.text: for me to notice any changes, and i think this stuff actually WORKS! I've had a few discolored spots on my face and today, day 3 of using this twice a day, the color is starting to blend in and "heal" itself to my natural skin tone. I'm african american if that helps.. I can't wait to see what this stuff can do in 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Summers

customer_reviews.title: New formula isn’t great
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve done more than look at top reviews. The old formula seems amazing— I thought that was what I was buying. After using it and not being impressed, I looked more closely at the reviews. The formula has changed, and not for the better. I will not buy again unless it changes back to the original. It definitely requires more than 2 small drops... and it doesn’t “drop” — it’s all gooey. It’s feels thick and looks shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Kamm

customer_reviews.title: Clears My Skin
customer_reviews.text: I used my 1st bottle of Vitamin C Serum, I noticed my skin cleared up (I'm 61!) and seemed brighter. I didn't see any noticeable reduction in spots, so when I was finished with the bottle I didn't reorder. After going about a month w/out this serum, my skin started to look dull -- so I got another bottle and I'm not going to go w/out it again! Results aren't immediate -- but gradual. I like Tree of Life b/c it appears they use high quality ingredients w/out a lot of fluff fillers -- and it's unscented. The dark brown bottle protects the ingredients from degrading, and it's made in the USA. Everything's on the up and up.
customer_reviews.author: Sally L.

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this but so far I am impressed. I wasn't sure exactly how much to use so I was just using a drop. Thinking that this was not enough to cover my whole face, I upped it a bit (okay, a lot) and that was a mistake. A little is good, a lot is not. My face felt very tacky and unnatural. I asked the question to Tree of Life and received an almost immediate response. A drop is all I needed. I really like the way it feels (when applied properly). This old broad is looking forward to not looking SO old once my birthday rolls around in about six months.
customer_reviews.author: K T-berry

customer_reviews.title: A very lightweight moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Have used so many vitamin c serums before and this is the first time purchasing this brand. The product is very thin and absorbs very quickly. So it's ideal for use even under makeup. I however use this only in my night time routine. I wear a night moistuzer over this as I have extremely dry skin and and the moisturization from the serum doesn't seem enough for me. I haven't noticed much of a difference yet. Been using only for a week now. Will update when I am done with the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Madhumitha Sridharan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product to brighten and tighten skin!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with the care and maintenance of my skin. I’m constantly searching for the best products to keep my skin youthful and fresh. One issue that I kept having was waking up with dull skin. No amount of moisturizer or highlighter was brightening up my face. I kept seeing Vitamin C as the active ingredient in several high end moisturizers. I decided to give this product a try first. I am OBSESSED. I put the serum on my face every morning after washing, and it is truly the only product that gives me a natural and beautiful glow. By adding this to my routine, my skin truly has never looked better.
customer_reviews.author: Halie Pizzagoni

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what I got, but it's not Vitamin C Serum.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Vitamin C Serum to have handy before my other bottle ran out. I just opened it today and it is a white milky solution. It's not anything like the serum in the bottles I've bought before. There's no way I'm putting this on my face. Unfortunately today is one day past the return date, so in the trash it goes. I'll be purchasing Vitamin C Serum again, but not this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tugiam

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing serum
customer_reviews.text: I’ve started developing some melasma spots on my face after sun exposure, and my esthetician advised me to use a vitamin C serum each day. She told me daily use is really beneficial to the skin at keeping it even and getting rid of sun spots. The serum in the spa was expensive, so I looked to Amazon for options. I’ve been using TOL for a week now, so it’s too soon for full results, but I’ve enjoyed it. I have dry, sensitive skin, but this helps keep me moisturized under my facial lotion. It dries quickly and feels nice without a strong scent. Looking forward to results over the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kreesa

customer_reviews.title: Needs to simmer
customer_reviews.text: I don't really have much to say about the product yet having used it for only 3 days since it arrived. So far so good, but I believe it will take time to finally notice results. So I will try to be patient. I do want to commend the vendor. Even before the product arrived they try to reach out to let you know ahead of time what to expect of the product and their accessibility for customer service just in case I run into problems. I haven't had to call them (yet) but knowing they are willing to address any issues is comforting. I would definitely consider buying from them again and even recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Maeishes

customer_reviews.title: product has changed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product in the past. When I opened it, I actually thought it had been mislabeled. After reading other reviews, I realized the formula for the product had changed. I would like to like this, but I don't. It leaves a sticky feeling residue, although that does go away when it dries. But it also makes my skin feel itchy and doesn't have the brightening effect I had come to expect. I wish I could buy the original product because it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: I don’t quite understand all of the raving reviews. I find that this serum sits on top of the skin. It’s an odd consistency. I suppose you get what you pay for: I usually buy a high end $30-$40 serum and decided to try something cheaper since it has such great reviews; clearly, the quality is lacking here.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't absorb at all
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this twice and am not happy with this bottle. I realized something I was using on my face in the morning was just sitting on the top of my skin - if I'd gently run my fingers down my face, little rolls of product would come off. By process of elimination, I realized it was this. Not buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin C product
customer_reviews.text: I love that this serum has other natural ingredients that are healing to the skin, like horsetail extract and witch hazel, which both control blemishes. I also love that it doesn’t include HLA like most of the other Vitamin C serums do. I use a separate HLA product so I like that this really just focuses on the antioxidant properties of Vitamin C. I don’t like the dropper bottle, but at least there’s less product waste. I love an attractive package but I really that costs more too. Thanks for making a really great product!
customer_reviews.author: Hair Maven

customer_reviews.title: Loving this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on a recommendation from a friend in hopes of reducing some spots and scarring as well is for its anti-aging properties. I've only been using it for a week, so I haven't seen any marked differences, but my friend has raved about how much her skin has improved over a month. For me, the smell is slight and not aversive, the product goes on smoothly, and my face feels moisturized! Can't wait to see more results over time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction!
customer_reviews.text: If you have fair, sensitive skin beware of allergic reaction! I'm naturally really pale and have sensitive skin, but usually I can use any product without a negative reaction. I used this for the first time last night before I went to bed, and woke up with red, hot, itchy blotches across my face! It's a shame because my skin does feel nice and moisturized, but of course I won't continue using this. Sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: HLO

customer_reviews.title: Not miraculous.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a bit C serum and I'm not sure if it's working for my skin. It has been a month since I started using it but haven't seen much difference, it gets absorbed into the skin really quickly so I mix it with rosehip oil and then apply it all over my face. It has made my skin a little smooth other time, I will keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Rohan L.

customer_reviews.title: After a few weeks trial, not using anymore
customer_reviews.text: Serum felt a little gummy once spread over my face. Not bad after moisturizer and foundation though and lends to a dewy look instantly. However, I ordered the product looking for something with minimal ingredients that wasn’t harsh on the skin and after using for a few weeks have found that this product is causing my skin to breakout. Perhaps is case by case product based on your skin type but did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina B Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I got some breakouts.
customer_reviews.text: I really don't have a sensitive skin, but I tried different vitamin c and Tree of life is the one I won't recommend. The packaging looks cheap and the serum itself is so thick compare to the others that I used before. The biggest concern is every time I will be using it, I'm getting break outs. I know my skin doesn't like this serum because I tried several times to see if this is really the cause. I will stop using it for a week and once I use it again, even just once, I'm getting break outs. It also dried my skin instead of moisturizing it. Not buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Santos
